hero.main: Transform your classroom and personalise learning
hero.body: Mathspace gives your students step-by-step support as they work through interactive, curriculum-aligned content

difference.title: Why we're different
difference.subTitle: An adaptive maths platform with a real difference
difference.body: Challenge high achievers, support those who struggle and empower your students.

cards.title: Personalised Learning
cards.body: Our adaptive learning technology provides highly individualised learning paths for each student

cards.title: Real-time Student Data
cards.body: Teachers unlock real-time insights into how students are progressing, and which students need assistance

cards.title: Step-by-step Feedback
cards.body: Students get scaffolded hints and video lessons as they work, no matter which way they solve a problem

teacher.title: How will I benefit as a Maths teacher?
teacher.description: As a maths teacher you're committed to helping your students excel in maths and we created Mathspace to help you do that

testimony.info: Lauren Borschmann, Xavier College Burke Hall, VIC
testimony.body: It makes the ideal real! I can differentiate effectively and I can support students to drive their own learning. This ultimately helps to build intrinsic motivation towards maths

student.title: Why students love Mathspace
student.description: Many students get anxious about getting their maths answers wrong. We created Mathspace to show students there’s a different way. By giving step-by-step support, students feel safe to make mistakes, learn from them and ultimately develop a growth mindset

items.text: Adaptive technology that tailors content to where students are at
Progress ticks to show students that they’re on track
Hints and next step support at every step of the solution
14,000+ video lessons created by math teachers

testimony.info: Student from Hunter School of Performing Arts, NSW
testimony.body: I love how it teaches you with videos and hints to help you think. It is a great tool to help you learn fast and efficiently

footerTitle: Access the power of Personalised Maths Teaching

difference.title: Why we're different

difference.body: Challenge high achievers, support those who struggle and empower your students.

cards.title: Personalized Learning
cards.body: Our adaptive learning technology provides highly individualized learning paths for each student

cards.title: Interactive Textbooks
cards.body: Access our standards-aligned curriculum, and see lessons brought to life through videos, investigations and hands-on GeoGebra applets

cards.title: Step-by-step Feedback
cards.body: Students can show their work and get scaffolded hints and video lessons along the way, no matter how they solve the problem

teacher.title: How will I benefit as a Math teacher?
teacher.description: As a math teacher you’re committed to helping your students excel in mathematics and we created Mathspace to help you do that.

testimony.info: Jenna Ross, Knox Middle School, Rowan Salisbury School District
testimony.body: Mathspace has really aided growth throughout my class. I feel like there are two teachers and one is available 24/7 for students! My students are able to accomplish more than they had prior to implementing the program. I was hesitant to start Mathspace, but this quickly changed when I was exposed to all the amazing things that the program offers! It has helped me truly meet the needs of ALL my learners!

student.title: Why students love Mathspace
student.description: Many students get anxious about getting their math answers wrong. We created Mathspace to show students there’s a different way. By giving step-by-step support, students feel safe to make mistakes, learn from them and ultimately develop a growth mindset.

items.text: Adaptive technology that tailors content to where students are at
Progress checks to show students that they’re on track
Hints and next step support at every step of the solution
14,000+ video lessons created by math teachers

testimony.info: Student from Grace M. Davis High School
testimony.body: What I like about Mathspace is that it really helps me to solve problems by giving hints and videos as I work

footerTitle: Access the Power of Personalized Math Teaching
